item.description:
Hello all,

Every other week game night is back! I made it at a little later time to give you all an opportunity to grab a bite to eat before coming. Bring snacks to share and whatever you like to drink.

Remember there are parking logistics. No parking in front, no parking on the side of the house. Parking is available on the street, at the funeral home or CVS parking lots.

 

Don't forget $1.00 for Nina our awesomeness organizer.

 

 I look forward to seeing you guys!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Margaaaarriiiitttaaaasss Game night is back for a while
